name: db-performance-tester
description: Performance testing application for ClickHouse vs PostgreSQL

scripts.clean:db: npm run build && node dist/src/utils/cleanup.js db
scripts.clean:output: npm run build && node dist/src/utils/cleanup.js output
scripts.help:start: echo 'npm start [-- options]' && echo 'Options: --query-only, --iterations <N>, --time-limit <N>' && echo 'Examples:' && echo '  npm start -- --query-only --iterations 50' && echo '  npm start -- --time-limit 120'
scripts.help:query-test: echo 'npm run query-test [-- options]' && echo 'Options: --iterations <N>, --time-limit <N>' && echo 'Examples:' && echo '  npm run query-test -- --iterations 200' && echo '  npm run query-test -- --time-limit 30'
